english.segment1: Not one thing do i want more. Than only to love you lord. I just wanna please you. And i want you to know. I am yours
english.segment2: This one thing my heart longs for. To be closer to you lord. I just wanna please you. And i want you to know. I am yours
english.segment3: Oh i am yours. Oh i am yours
english.segment4: I am yours i am yours. Everything i am. Everything i have. I am yours i am yours. My heart and soul. My mind and strength. I am yours i am yours. I am yours i am yours lord
